The best known Iyo Shoami Cho tsuba is larger, but not so thick.  I've seen many examples of this tsuba, many <sigh> not so worn as this one.

http://zincavage.org/ChoTsuba.html
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jim Gilbert 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 26, 2006 8:57 PM
  Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: tsuba school


  The thickness is not at all unusual for Iyo Shoami, although the small size is a bit.

  Jim



    It is iron.  I had thought some Shoami too, but the thickness and weight seems unusual to me.
